textBeforeTable: Sizing Chart Country of Origin: Pakistan Embroidered in the USA Men's navy blue, short sleeve pique polo made with soft, yet strong, 6.8 oz. Pima cotton giving it extra comfort and life. It has a 3-button placket with pearl buttons along with a welt collar and cuffs giving it a clean finished appearance. Single needle safety stitched shoulder seam and hemmed bottom with side vents provide just the right finishing touch. This is a very comfortable, good-looking, yet durable polo that would make a great gift for the Patriot in your life. textAfterTable: The body lengths are taken from the highest point, which is where the collar is sewn to the body. The width of the shirt is taken 1 inch below the armhole, or underarm seam.
